progetto.view.gui

Class ToolCardPaneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.view.gui.AbstractController
      • progetto.view.gui.ToolCardPaneController

  • public class ToolCardPaneController
extends AbstractController
    this is the class that handles the tool card fxml. This class is only instanced by javafx, this mean that must have a default constructor.
    Author:
    Federica
